Indigestion Indigestion means discomfort of mainly the upper part of your stomach which may also have other symptoms such as stomach pain, bloating, feeling full etc. Detox Tablet relieves these symptoms and helps in proper digestion of food. This improves the movement of food in your stomach and gut (intestine) and makes you feel better. Take Detox Tablet as prescribed by the doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Detox Tablet is to be taken with food. How Detox Tablet works Detox Tablet is a combination of two medicines: Pancreatin and Ornithine. Pancreatin is a pancreatic enzyme supplement. The enzyme helps in digesting food when it passes through the gut. It gets mixed with the food and improves digestion. Ornithine is an amino acid that belongs to the class of medications called nutritional supplements. It works by increasing the efficiency of energy consumption and promoting the excretion of ammonia.
